features.title: Exclusive Pricing Plans
features.subtitle: Unlock your access to premium vehicle deals with a one-time fee.

newCar.title: New Car Plan
newCar.description: For just $49.95, gain access to unbeatable deals on new cars. Experience the thrill of driving your dream car!
newCar.tooltip: Don't miss out on this exclusive opportunity!

newCar: Free test drives to feel the excitement

tradeIn.title: Trade-In Plan
tradeIn.description: Maximize your trade-in value with a one-time fee of $16.95. Get the best value for your vehicle effortlessly!
tradeIn.savings: 40% off for early birds! Limited time offer.

tradeIn: Instant cash offers that put you first
Flexible trade-in options tailored to you
